channel.title: Help with this npc dialogue problem
channel.description:
So my npc dialogue is messed up i click "click here to continue" and it just says "please wait..." and it stays like that. Here is a video:
[url=http://s1108.photobucket.com/albums/h420/Jaruanna/?action=view&current=omg.mp4]omg.mp4 video by Jaruanna - Photobucket[/url]
Any fix? im using delta is it client or server sided?

item.title: Help with this npc dialogue problem
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

13lack drag:

lemme see the code for the dialouge

[code] case 40:
if (NpcDialogue == 1) {
NpcDialogue += 1;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

                    break;[/code]

/* NPC Talking */ public void UpdateNPCChat() { /* * sendFrame126("", 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("", * 4904); sendFrame126("", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); */ sendFrame126("", 976); switch (NpcDialogue) { case 1: talk("f", 1429); break; case 2: playertalk("sd", "Poop"); break; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Help with this npc dialogue problem
